trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供資料給<xref href="System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The CreatingCookieEventArgs class supplies values to any <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie> event handler.
trans-unit.target: CreatingCookieEventArgs 類別可以提供任何值<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie>事件處理常式。</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie>

trans-unit.source: By using the properties of this class, you can retrieve user credentials when you create a custom authentication cookie.
trans-unit.target: 使用此類別的屬性，您可以擷取使用者認證，當您建立自訂驗證 cookie。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class raises the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie> event when it sets the authentication cookie, after the user credentials have been authenticated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>類別所引發<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie>時已驗證的使用者認證之後，它會設定的驗證 cookie，事件。</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class constructs a CreatingCookieEventArgs object and passes it to any <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie> event handler.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>建構 CreatingCookieEventArgs 物件類別，並將它傳遞至任何<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie>事件處理常式。</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>

trans-unit.source: You retrieve the user credentials through the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.CreatingCookieEventArgs.UserName%2A><xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.CreatingCookieEventArgs.Password%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.CreatingCookieEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 擷取使用者認證，透過<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.CreatingCookieEventArgs.UserName%2A><xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.CreatingCookieEventArgs.Password%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.CreatingCookieEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.CreatingCookieEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.CreatingCookieEventArgs.Password%2A></xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.CreatingCookieEventArgs.UserName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.CreatingCookieEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A> property can contain any custom values that you need in order to authenticate, such as an identification number.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.CreatingCookieEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A>屬性可以包含任何您需要為了進行驗證，例如身分證號碼的自訂值。</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.CreatingCookieEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.CreatingCookieEventArgs.IsPersistent%2A> property indicates whether the authentication cookie should be retained past the current session.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.CreatingCookieEventArgs.IsPersistent%2A>屬性會指出驗證 cookie 是否應保留過去的目前工作階段。</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.CreatingCookieEventArgs.IsPersistent%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.CreatingCookieEventArgs.CookieIsSet%2A> property to `true` if you create the authentication cookie, so that the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class does not create the cookie.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.CreatingCookieEventArgs.CookieIsSet%2A>屬性`true`如果您建立的驗證 cookie，以便<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>類別並不會建立 cookie。</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.CreatingCookieEventArgs.CookieIsSet%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the authentication cookie has been created.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否已建立的驗證 cookie。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class checks the CookieIsSet property to determine whether the authentication cookie has been created.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>類別檢查 CookieIsSet 屬性，以判斷是否已建立的驗證 cookie。</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>

trans-unit.source: You set this value to `true` if you create an authentication cookie in an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie> event.
trans-unit.target: 您將此值設定為`true`如果您的事件處理常式中建立的驗證 cookie<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie>事件。</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie>

trans-unit.source: If CookieIsSet is set to `false` (the default value), the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class creates an authentication cookie, This overwrites any cookie that you have created in the handler for the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果設為 CookieIsSet `false` （預設值），<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>類別會建立驗證 cookie，這會覆寫您的處理常式中建立任何 cookie<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie>事件。</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.CreatingCookie> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the authentication cookie was created; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果驗證 cookie 已建立;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets additional authentication values that are provided by the user.
trans-unit.target: 取得使用者所提供的其他驗證值。

trans-unit.source: You use the CustomCredential property to retrieve custom values in the authentication ticket.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 CustomCredential 屬性來擷取驗證票證中的自訂值。

trans-unit.source: The CustomCredential property contains the value passed to the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: CustomCredential 屬性包含值傳遞至<xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, this property is used to pass custom values that must be validated with the user name and password, such as an identification number.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，這個屬性用來傳遞必須驗證的使用者名稱和密碼，例如身分證號碼的自訂值。

trans-unit.source: If more than one value is stored in the property, you must parse the CustomCredential property in order to retrieve values.
trans-unit.target: 如果多個值儲存在屬性中，您必須剖析 CustomCredential 屬性來擷取值。

trans-unit.source: The custom values required for authentication, other than user name and password.
trans-unit.target: 需要驗證，使用者名稱和密碼以外的自訂值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the authentication cookie should be retained beyond the current session.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出驗證 cookie 是否應保留超過目前工作階段。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationTicket> object, you can use the IsPersistent property to specify whether the authentication cookie is retained beyond the current session.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立<xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationTicket>物件，您可以使用 IsPersistent 屬性來指定驗證 cookie，是否要保留超過目前工作階段。</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationTicket>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cookie should be retained beyond the current session; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果 cookie 應該保留超過目前工作階段中。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the password for the user.
trans-unit.target: 取得使用者的密碼。

trans-unit.source: You use the Password property to retrieve the password when you set custom values in the authentication ticket.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用密碼屬性來擷取密碼，當您設定驗證票證中的自訂值。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Do not save the value of the Password property in the authentication ticket.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 並儲存在驗證票證的密碼屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: A malicious user can access the cookie and retrieve the password even though the cookie is encrypted.
trans-unit.target: 惡意使用者可以存取 cookie，並擷取密碼，即使已加密的 cookie。

trans-unit.source: The password that is provided by the user for authentication.
trans-unit.target: 密碼所提供的使用者進行驗證。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name for the user.
trans-unit.target: 取得使用者的名稱。

trans-unit.source: You use the UserName property to retrieve the authentication name when you set custom values in the authentication ticket.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 UserName 屬性擷取驗證名稱，當您設定驗證票證中的自訂值。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you set the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationTicket.Name%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationTicket> object to the UserName value.
trans-unit.target: 通常您設定<xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationTicket.Name%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationTicket>UserName 值的物件。</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationTicket> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationTicket.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name that is provided by the user for authentication.
trans-unit.target: 驗證使用者所提供的名稱。
